text: Will X'mas ever get here
I hope it gets here soon
I guess while I'm still waiting
I could still have fun with you
Maybe if we keep playing
It could help to pass the time...
I could come over to your house
Or you could come over to mine..
Before we know it, its X'mas day and we'll finally get to see
Everything that Santa bought, underneath that X'mas tree

X'mas do you think this time
You might suddenly appear
And maybe if I'm really good....
You might come faster next year...
